name: zen-notes
description: Zen is a self-hosted personal productivity and journaling app that blends tasks, notes, and reflections in a calm interface. It aims to reduce friction and distraction while tracking daily work and thoughts.
features: Task management: Create and organize tasks with due dates, priorities, and completion tracking in a minimal interface.
Daily journaling: Write daily reflections and notes that are automatically organized by date for easy review.
Distraction-free writing: Focus on content with a clean, minimal interface that removes unnecessary UI elements.
Markdown support: Format notes and tasks using Markdown syntax for structured, readable content.
Calendar view: Visualize tasks and journal entries on a calendar to understand workload and patterns.
Search functionality: Find past notes and tasks quickly with full-text search across all content.
Tag organization: Categorize notes and tasks with custom tags for flexible filtering and grouping.
Progress tracking: Monitor task completion rates and journaling consistency with simple statistics.
Export options: Download your notes and tasks in Markdown or JSON format for backup or migration.
Privacy focused: Store all data locally or on your own server without third-party cloud services.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and manage content efficiently with comprehensive keyboard navigation.
Recurring tasks: Set up repeating tasks that automatically regenerate on completion or schedule.
